testcase.name: Successful CreateTask with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome Browser............................................passed When User open url "https://kyro.pages.dev/"................................passed And User should click on Login button.......................................passed And User enter Email as "ezra.sastry.musali@gmail.com" and password as "Ezrasastry@9".passed And click on Submit button..................................................passed Then User should verify Home Page with keyword "Risks"......................passed When User Click on Dashboard................................................passed And User should verify the Dashboard page with keyword "Project Owner, CenterPoint Energy".passed And User Click on ViewAll button............................................passed And User should verify the Project Name and Tasks with Keyword "Summary"....passed And User click on CreateTask button.........................................passed And User enter summary as "It is MEGA Project"..............................passed And User enter tasktype as "civil construction type like NH-6 Way Road".....passed And User enter description as "Complex Project"............................passed And User enter Priority.....................................................passed And User enter location as "Chennai"........................................passed And User enter Startingdate as "09/06/2022" and endingdate as "09/07/2025"..passed And User click on submit button.............................................passed Then User should verify the Task............................................passed When User click on Dashboard................................................passed And User should click on Flag on Top Right..................................passed And User click on Logout option.............................................passed
